sentence: Monday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 6,432.26.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.77 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 2.53 to 1 ratio.
There were 2121 advancers and 837 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 162 stocks reached a 52 week high and 12 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up 1.14% for the day; a total of 67.16 points.
Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ( REGN ) had the largest percent change down (-5.6%) while MercadoLibre, Inc. ( MELI ) had the largest percent change gain rising 9.72%.
The Dow Jones index closed up 1.19% for the day; a total of 259.58 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-.81%) while DowDuPont Inc. ( DWDP ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.08%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
